Kathmandu –Manakamana Dharshan – Pokhara Tour 5 NIGHT / 6 DAYS

Itinerary

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” height=”false” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”] 
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]DAY 1: KATHMANDU
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12.2″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]Meeting upon arrival at Kathmandu International Airport by our representative.

Transfer to the Hotel.
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/sr-g_sb3m5o.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12.2″] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]Day 2: KATHMANDU
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12.2″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]Morning Mountain Flight & Sightseeing at Kathmandu (Pashupatinath, Budanilkantha sleeping Vishnu, Boudhanatha Etc).
Overnight at the Hotel.
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/mpykqk3gzse.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12.2″] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Day 3: CHITWAN

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12.2″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Drive to Chitwan. Observe the Tharu culture dance in the evening.
Overnight at the Jungle Lodge.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”27px|0px|14px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Day 4: CHITWAN & POKHARA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12.2″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Activity at Chitwan and drive to Pokhara.
Overnight at the Hotel.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”30px|0px|17px|0px|false|false” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Day 05: POKHARA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12.2″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Explore around the famous sites at Pokhara & drive back to Kathmandu in the afternoon. Overnight at the Hotel.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”30px|0px|17px|0px|false|false” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Day 06: DEPARTURE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12.2″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Transfer to airport.
End of our services.
